Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and short cap sleeves. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Embroidery in a contrasting colour around the neckline and sleeves.

Ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with semi-shiny panels down the sides. High waist with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with ribbed panels. Inset jersey panels in the sides and zipped front pockets. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
